title: Cheetah
speed: up to 70 mph (112 km/h) in short bursts
age: lifespan of 10-12 years in the wild
facts: adapted for speed with a lightweight body and non-retractable claws
acceleration from 0 to 60 mph (0 to 97 km/h) in just a few seconds
distinctive black tear marks help reduce glare
solitary hunters, except during mating and raising cubs
